main event: A U.S. Navy P2V aircraft tracked a white unidentified aerial object on radar at a height of 3,700 feet, which accelerated to a maximum speed of 2,000 knots.
interesting points: The object was initially tracked at a height of 3,700 feet and a speed of 145 knots., The object accelerated to a maximum speed of 2,000 knots., The aircraft lost visual contact when the object reversed direction and sped away 80 miles in seconds., No further data was obtained regarding the incident., The report was considered worthy of further investigation.
